ComicInfo.Summary: Sara leads Tsin's ninjas as they track down and destroy underworld demons before they can become human and blend in. Eric warns Jake to stay away from Sara but, when he stabs his fellow officer in the shoulder with a weapon very similar to the Witchblade, Jake shoots him in the face.
